errors.error_description: Specifies exact dependency versions that may conflict with system packages or become outdated
correction_candidates: Use minimum version requirements like setuptools>=40.0 instead of exact versions
Remove version specifications entirely and let pip resolve dependencies
Use compatible version specifiers like setuptools~=40.0 for safer upgrades
Pin only major versions like setuptools>=40,<60 to allow minor updates
errors.golden_answer: Remove version specifications entirely and let pip resolve dependencies
